```{r logfactsum}
library(gpuR)
library(gpuRandom)
x<-vclMatrix(c(1:36), 6,6,type="double")
gpuRandom:::logfactsumBackend(x, c(1,1))


x2<-vclMatrix(c(1:36), 6,6,type="integer")
gpuRandom:::logfactsumBackend(x2, c(16,16))

xx = as.matrix(x2)
sum(lfactorial(xx))
```
